Action.author: yukkyhira
Action.body: I have reproduced this issue and started to work on.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: This seems to stem from a misunderstanding of the policy format. The {{<MSPID>.<id>}} format does not support OUs, instead it refers to roles. The current set of possible roles are 'Admin', 'Peer', and 'Client'. So this is not a bug. It would be a useful addition to the policy parsing language to support OUs, but this is not a bug, rather a new feature.
